text:
Hello Everyone, I really need help from you experts:

I want to publish an app in the HubSpot App marketplace and in my app I want to keep a condition that if someone has a HubSpot operation hub then only additional fields will be synced and two-way sync will be there.

Sharing one example: In the below account I have the HubSpot Operation Hub so it says that the app is compatible with the HubSpot plan. (Screenshot 2)

Whereas in the other account, I do not have the HubSpot Operation Hub so it says this (screenshot 1)

How can I setup this condition in my app?
